steamdown.msg1: The Steam Community is currently down
steamdown.msg2: We were unable to get your ID based on what you entered.
steamdown.msg3: Please enter your STEAM_0:0:00000 ID or wait untill Steam comes back online
steamdown.msg4: Sorry we were unable to get your Steam ID.
steamdown.msg5: You probably entered an incorrect Steam ID
steamdown.msg6: Please check and make sure you entered a valid Steam ID and try again.

donate.msg2: Welcome back %s your current donor perks expire on
donate.msg3: Sorry, the minimum donation that can be processed is $5. Please adjust accordingly
donate.msg4: Please make sure this is you!
donate.msg5: You wish to donate $%s. For your generosity, you will receive %s days of donor perks
donate.msg8: Please select the colors and tag you would like to use for your in-game chat.
donate.msg9: If this is you, and you agree please click below, to proceed with your donation, you will be redirected to PayPal to process your contribution.

admin.title: Donor List
admin.searchmsg: Search for Name, SteamID, or Email
admin.delconf: Are you sure you want to delete this user, and remove them from all databases?  This is permanent and cant be un-done!
admin.sq3: There are no limitations to the command you can send. So be careful.
admin.sq2: This tool will send the command you specify to all of the game servers you have connected to SourceBans.
admin.sq4: Something went wrong querying the servers
